name: Grand Poo World
overview: This hack is dedicated to the speedrunner and Twitch streamer Grand Poo Bear. This hack is designed to challenge even the most skilled Super Mario World kaizo players. This hack features customized music and palettes over a more vanilla style SMW style. Special thanks to Nexus15, Linkdeadx2, com_poser and Kaizoman for their above and beyond efforts in making this hack all it could be. Good luck, have fun.
